string.text: {HERO} został awansowany do rangi {TIER}

{HERO}, służyłeś wystarczająco długo, aby wypełnić swój pobór. Możesz odejść i zachować swój ekwipunek, ale potrzebuję doświadczonych żołnierzy. Oferuję Ci bonus 25000 {COIN} jeżeli zechcesz pozostać.
Zostanę
Odchodzę

{HERO}, udowodniłeś że jesteś niezrównanym wojownikiem. Setki moich wrogów zninęło z Twoich rąk. Potrzebuję takich ludzi jak Ty w moim królestwie. Uczynię Ciebie moim wasalem. Otrzymasz także wysoką premię jeżeli się zgodzisz
Nadam Ci {FIEF} jako lenno jako nagrodę za Twoją służbę
Moje miejsce jest jako żołnierz na polu bitwy
Porozmawiaj ze mną ponownie jak zmienisz zdanie
To będzie honor by Ci służyć
Otrzymasz 500000 {COIN} jako nagrodę za Twoją służbę
{HERO}, otrzymałem wiadomość od {KING}, przywódcy naszego królestwa. {KING_GENDER_PRONOUN} chce porozmawiać z Tobą osobiście na temat nadania tytułu lorda. Masz pozwolenie by opuścić bandę
Chcę zostać
Pójdę więc

TODO: {HERO}, you have proven yourself to be a fine warrior. For your bravery and loyalty, I have decided to give you a promotion. Visit my blade smith and armourer in the camp and they will provide you with the gear befitting your new rank
To dla mnie zaszczyt
Pozwól mi dołączyć do Twojej bandy
Nie ma szans by bandyta jak Ty dołączył do moich szeregów
Nie chcę Ciebie w moich szeregach. Nie dogadujemy się
Na temat tego oferowanego tytułu lorda
TODO: {HERO}, you have shown yourself to be a warrior with no equal. Hundreds of my enemies have died by your hands. I need people like you in my kingdom
To będzie dla mnie zaszczyt by Ci służyć
Zmieniłem zdanie
Nadam Ci osadę
jako osobiste lenno w nagrodę za służbę
Otrzymasz 500000 {COIN} jako nagrodę za Twoją służbę
Pewnie, możesz dołączyć
{HERO} został pobrany w randze {TIER} z powodu wysokiej reputacji u {FACTION}
Zmień ekwipunek

TODO: A small group of bandits is way to nimble to catch normally. The only way to catch them is to trick them into attacking, although there is a chance things could go wrong
TODO: You need to be mounted to do this
TODO: You are wounded
TODO: The bandits did not fall for your trap
TODO: You took some minor injuries while being chased by bandits
Opuść grupę
TODO: This will damage your reputation with the {FACTION}
TODO: Are you sure you want to abandon the party? This will harm relations with the entire faction
TODO: {HERO}, I heard you are not happy with your current assignment. What to would you rather do instead?
TODO: Would this bag of {GOLD}{COIN} gold change your mind?
TODO: Okay, you can do that
TODO: I want to do manual labor
TODO: I want to do guard duty
TODO: I want to prepare the meals
TODO: I want to forage for supplies
TODO: I want to drill the troops
Oczywiście, przyjacielu
TODO: Of course, you are the perfect person for the job
TODO: Sorry, but I dont think you have the skills for the job
TODO: okay thanks bye
TODO: You made a very persuasive argument. Fine, you can be one of my sergeants
TODO: I want to lead the scouting expeditions
TODO: You made a very persuasive argument. Fine, you can lead my scouts
TODO: I want manage logistics
TODO: You made a very persuasive argument. Fine, you can be my quartmaster
TODO: I want to build war machines
TODO: You made a very persuasive argument. Fine, you can be an engineer
TODO: I want to take care of the wounded
TODO: You made a very persuasive argument. Fine, you can be a surgeon
TODO: I want to discuss war strategies
TODO: You made a very persuasive argument. Fine, you can be my strategist
TODO: {HERO}, your enlistment contact has not expired yet. I can not have my soldiers leaving whenever they feel like
TODO: You are right my lord my lord. I will return to my duties
TODO: I do need the money... Fine you may leave
TODO: Select equipment to use

TODO: you are currently assigned to perform grunt work. Most tasks are unpleasant, tiring or involve menial labor (Passive Daily Athletics XP)
TODO: }you are currently assigned to guard duty. You spend many sleepless night keeping watch for signs intruders (Passive Daily Scouting XP)
TODO: you are currently assigned as one of the cooks. You prepare the camps meals with whatever limited ingredients avalible (Passive Daily Steward XP)
TODO: you are currently assigned to forage. You ride through the nearby countryside looking for food (Passive Daily Riding XP and Daily Food To Party)
TODO: you are currently assigned as the surgeon. You spend you time taking care of the wounded men (Medicine XP from party)
TODO: you are currently assigned as the engineer. The party relies on your knowelege of siegecraft to build war machines (Engineering XP from party)
TODO: you are currently assigned to quartermaster. You make sure that the party is well supplied and the troops get paid on time (Steward XP from party)

TODO: you are currently assigned to lead the scouting parties. You and your men spend their time looking for signs of enemy parties and easy passages through difficult terrain (Scouting XP from party)
TODO: you are currently assigned as one of the sergeants. You drill the men for war and discipline(beat) anyone who steps out of line (Passive Daily Leadership XP and Daily XP To Troops In Party)
TODO: you are currently assigned as the strategist. You spend your time in the commader's tent discussing war plans (Tactics XP from party)
TODO: you have no current assigned duties. You spend your idle time drinking, gambling, and chatting with the idle soilders
TODO: I'm here to teach you miserable maggots how to fight, so you better listen up and do everything I say!
TODO: Controll the recruits and gain enough xp throught dueling to be able to upgrade them and complete the mission
TODO: You will fail the mission if all recruit get knocked out before getting enough xp
Rekrutów pozostało
Trening zakończony
Trening w trakcie
Nie możesz odejść póki nie zakończy się trening!
TODO: The men need time to rest and recover. There is no one left to fight
TODO: I should stop before I seriously injury myself
Wygrałeś, poddaję się!
To naprawdę bolało, poddaję się!
Tym razem miałeś szczęście. Następnym razem Cię pokonam!
TODO: I am going to be sore in the morning!
Dobra walka przyjacielu!
Mogłem się na to nie zgadzać!
Ahhh! I chyba coś złamałem!
Nie spodziewałęm się że bronie treningowe tak bardzo bolą!
To niesprawiedliwe, oszukiwałeś!
Poddaję się!
Łucznicy
Łucznicy konni
Ciężka piechota
Lekka kawaleria
Ciężka kawaleria
TODO: {HERO}, You have done well, the recruits can actual hold their own now. [rf:very_positive_hi, rb:very_positive]
TODO: Just doing my job!
TODO: {HERO} I expected better from you! [rf:very_positive_ag, rb:very_positive]
TODO: I am sorry my lord

TODO: {HERO} I have a task for you! I have a bunch of new recruits that won't be of much use in a battle. I need you to train them and get them caught up to the rest of the army. You can make use of the sparring equipment at the arena to train [rf:very_positive_ag, rb:very_positive]
TODO: Of course my lord!
TODO: I can't turn a bunch of peasants into soldiers overnight, only the trials of many battles can do that
TODO: Thank you {HERO}, You saved my bussiness![rf:very_positive_hi, rb:very_positive]
TODO: {HERO} are you okay?[rf:unsure_hi, rb:unsure]
TODO: I'm fine. I'm sorry I let the thugs escape

TODO: Don't feel bad, the thugs had you outnumbered. You had no chance against that many. The commotion from that fight drew the attention of every guard in town. The thugs had to flee so fast that the weren't able to take any of my merchandise with them
TODO: Glad I could help
TODO: Guards! Guards! {ROBBER}'s thugs are stealing all of the goods from my shop! Come quick before they get away![rf:very_negative_hi, rb:very_negative]
TODO: I am a soldier not a guard! This is none of my bussiness!
TODO: {RIVAL_GANG_LEADER}'s Party
TODO: A few of the men from your party found your body and brought it back to the camp
TODO: Well done {HERO}, here is the money I promised you![rf:very_positive_hi, rb:very_positive]

TODO: You want to make some quick gold? I got a problem with a upstart by the name of {RIVAL}. {GENDER_PRONOUN} has been bothering shop owners under our protection, demanding money and making threats. Let me tell you something - those shop owners are my cows, and no one else gets to milk them. Me and my boys are eager to teach them a lesson but I figure some extra muscle wouldn't hurt.
TODO: Quick gold you say, sign me up!
TODO: I don't want any part in this
TODO: Men! Ready you weapons! I warned these poacher scum never to come back here again! [rf:very_negative_hi, rb:very_negative]
TODO: Time to teach those bastards a lesson!
TODO: Thank you so much for protecting our village![rf:very_positive_hi, rb:very_positive]

TODO: Men! We will be staying in this village for a while. The locals have told me a band of army deserters have been extorting the villagers. We will hide in the houses and ambush the brigands when they show up again
TODO: Sound the alarm! We are under attack! To arms men! [rf:very_negative_hi, rb:very_negative]
TODO: Where did they come from?
TODO: Bandit Ambush Party

TODO: As you walk through the ravaged village, you notice one house in particular that is covered in blood. As you walk closer the stench of death hits your nostrils. It become clear to you what happened here. The sturbon yet foolish family of this house decided to stay behind and defend what little they owned. The looting soldiers of your army had little patience for those that resisteted and cut down the family where they stood

TODO: Suddenly the sound of crys and screams catches your attention. Someone is still inside. As you go in to investigate, you quickly find source of the noise. It is a child, barely older than an infant. The soldiers that came by earlier either didn't notice or didn't have the heart to kill the child. You realize that with all the villagers driven away, it might be days or even weeks before anyone return and you are not sure what will happen to the child by then
Zabierz dziecko ze sobą
Opuść
{HERO} adoptował dziecko {CHILD}
Walka wręcz

TODO: Serve As Soldier : Knock downs while serving as a soldier in battle grant 0.3 renown
TODO: Serve As Soldier : Knock downs while fighting on foot in battles grant 0.3 renown
TODO: Serve As Soldier : Wages earned increased by 20%
TODO: Serve As Soldier : Knock downs caused by ranged damage in battles grant 0.3 renown
TODO: Serve As Soldier : Headshots in battle generate extra skill xp
TODO: Serve As Soldier : Crossbow shots in battle that hit from over 50 meters away generate extra skill xp
TODO: Serve As Soldier : Crossbow shots in battle while mounted generate extra skill xp
TODO: Serve As Soldier : Recieve a 1000 gold bonus for every enemy lord knocked out in battle
